name: cryptkeeper
tagline: node.js module to handle cross-platform crypto.
body:
# cryptkeeper

node.js module to handle cross-platform crypto in command line interfaces.

```sh
npm install -g cryptkeeper
```

So far, this wraps aspnet_regiis.exe for .net but there are plans to wrap other crypto related things.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
